title: Your Fave champ gets +500 damage on their ult
body:
How OP does your champion become?

{{champion:150}} Have Fun.

replies.body: {{champion:96}} DANCE FOOLS, DANCE!
{{champion:16}} ....
So, by picking Soraka you would add a Karthus to the enemy team.
I think it's the other way around. You would kill your own team
That's what he wrote, is it not?
Yeah. I read it wrong

{{champion:131}} 

....
ha.
haha.
hahahaha!
HAHAHAHA!!!
A-HAHA-HAHAHAHA!!!

**THE MOON ALSO RISES, BITCHES!!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA**

They won't ever make the mistake of thinking you're harmless again.

{{champion:17}}
{{champion:30}} ...

Umm, considering that his damage is expressed in damage *per wave,* Rammus' ultimate would become ludicrously powerful.
